Pre-Game Insights: Belarus take on Bulgaria at ZTE Arena in the first round of the group phase of the UEFA Nations League.
Belarus are ranked 99th in the FIFA world ranking, while Bulgaria is ranked 82nd.
Belarus scored 11 goals in their previous ten matches, averaging 1.1 goals per game, and conceded 12 goals, averaging 1.2 goals per game.
Bulgaria scored 14 goals in their past ten games, averaging 1.4 goals per game, and conceded 12 goals, averaging 1.2 goals per game.
Belarus managed two wins in their past six internationals, drew one, and lost three, scoring two goals and conceding ten.
Bulgaria managed one win in their past six internationals, drew five, and lost zero, scoring six goals and conceding seven.
Both teams are focused on not losing and might prefer a draw over risking a loss.
